SBTCVM Mark 2's user interface is meant to be as straightforward as possible. It may seem a bit complicated at first though. In this lesson we will go over SBTCVM's main GUI.
The largest and most obvious part is the TTY. It uses SBTCVM's SBTCVM-BTT-6 encoding, and offers both 9x9 and 9x18 fonts. Another important function of the TTY is printing Status messages such as when somthing goes ary. The Users manual lists these messages in detail.
